      • getLDAPConnectionFactory

        public LDAPConnectionFactoryImpl getLDAPConnectionFactory(String host,
                                                          int port,
                                                          org.forgerock.util.Options options)
        Description copied from interface: TransportProvider
        Returns an implementation of LDAPConnectionFactory. The address will be resolved each time a new connection is returned.
        Specified by:
        getLDAPConnectionFactory in interface TransportProvider
        Parameters:
        host - The hostname of the Directory Server to connect to.
        port - The port number of the Directory Server to connect to.
        options - The LDAP options to use when creating connections.
        Returns:
        an implementation of LDAPConnectionFactory

                                 throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: TransportProvider
        Returns an implementation of LDAPListener.
        Specified by:
        getLDAPListener in interface TransportProvider
        Parameters:
        addresses - The addresses to listen on.
        factory - The handler factory which will be used to create handlers.
        options - The LDAP listener options.
        Returns:
        an implementation of LDAPListener
        Throws:
        IOException - If an error occurred while trying to listen on the provided address.
